fields.name: ACE station number
fields.title: ACE station number
fields.description: Unique number of oceanographic sampling station at which water samples were collected

fields.name: ACE event number
fields.title: ACE event number
fields.description: Unique number of sampling event within ACE from which water samples were collected

fields.name: date time of sampling utc
fields.title: Date time of sampling
fields.description: Date and time at which the instrument deployment from which the samples were taken, began. For instance for a sample from the CTD rosette, this is the time at which the CTD deployment began [UTC]

fields.name: latitude decimal degrees N
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude at which the sampling event took place [decimal degrees north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Latitude of the vessel’s geographical position at the time of sampling event

fields.name: longitude decimal degrees E
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude at which the sampling event took place [decimal degrees east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Longitude of the vessel’s geographical position at the time of sampling event

fields.name: sampling method
fields.title: Sampling method
fields.description: Instrument from which the samples were taken or collected. ctd – water taken from the niskin bottles on the conductivity, temperature, depth (CTD) recorder rosette. trace metal rosette – water taken from the niskin bottles on the trace metal rosette. Underway – water taken from the continuously flowing water line from an intake approximately 5 m below the surface of the water. MilliQ – water taken system that produces MilliQ water.

fields.name: depth of sample m
fields.title: Depth of sample
fields.description: Depth of water from where the sample was collected [metres]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Depth below sea surface at which the seawater sample was collected

fields.name: ACE sample number
fields.title: ACE sample number
fields.description: Unique sample number for the sample within the ACE expedition. In format shipname/ACE/legnumber/projectnumber/julianday(UTC]/eventnumber/PIinitials/projectsamplenumber

fields.name: tube sample number
fields.title: Tube sample number
fields.description: Number written on the sample tube, created by project. In format ACE CTDcast_number leg_number sampling_depth or ACE julian_day (3 digits) event_number sampling_depth

fields.name: measuring date utc
fields.title: Measuring date
fields.description: Date when analysis was performed on sample [UTC]

fields.name: nitrous oxide µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of nitrous oxide
fields.description: Concentration of nitrous oxide NOx [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation nitrous oxide µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of nitrous oxide
fields.description: Standard deviation of measurements of concentration of nitrous oxide NOx [µmol per litre]

fields.name: phosphate µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of phosphate
fields.description: Concentration of phosphate PO4 [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation phosphate µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of phosphate
fields.description: Standard deviation of concentration of phosphate PO4 [µmol per litre]

fields.name: nitrite µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of nitrite
fields.description: Concentration of nitrite [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation nitrite µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of nitrite
fields.description: Standard deviation of concentration of nitrite [µmol per litre]

fields.name: silicic acid µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of silicic acid
fields.description: Concentration of silicic acid Si [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation silicic acid µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of silicic acid
fields.description: Standard deviation of concentration of silicate [µmol per litre]

fields.name: ammonium µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of ammonium
fields.description: Concentration of ammonium NH4 [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation ammonium µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of ammonium
fields.description: Standard deviation of concentration of ammonium NH4 [µmol per litre]

fields.name: nitrate µmol/L
fields.title: Concentration of nitrate
fields.description: Concentration of nitrate [µmol per litre]

fields.name: standard deviation nitrate µmol/L
fields.title: Standard deviation of concentration of nitrate
fields.description: Standard deviation of concentration of nitrate [µmol per litre]

fields.name: comments
fields.title: Comments
fields.description: Additional information to help understanding of data
